<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skull Creeper](/Feats.aspx?ID=2424) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 54 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You wear skulls to demoralize foes. You become trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) and gain the [Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796) skill feat. If you're already trained in Intimidation, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. If you pay 50 gp for a splendid skull mask, the mask grants you a +1 item bonus to Intimidation; its usage is worn (mask).
name: Skull Creeper
